channel.title: Travelling on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Travelling on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: Trading a well-paid job for ultimate freedom
item.description: Sometimes you have to make a decision in your life that goes against everything you ever learned. Recently I made such a decision by quitting my job and buying a ticket to the other side of the world. And now the adventure begins…
